//notes: we presume that the weight is per a single tray
may or may not come inside a paper box on spawn
both options are valid, so we don't assign a `container` to the tray
description: Black plastic tray for 50 pistol-caliber rounds, in a 5-by-10 grid.  Cheap and clearly molded, as evident by the traces of reinforcement pillars.  Paper boxes often use trays like this one to hold ammunition.

notes: height from source (5.2 in.) is likely for a stack of 10 trays, as seen in one the images in the description
we use the height of a 3D model of a similar tray (13 mm ≈ 0.51 in.) instead, in order to err on the side of caution

//magazine_well: emulates bullets sitting inside slots (~50% volume for 9×19mm)
